verses.verse: The child<WH5288> Samuel<WH8050> ministered<WH8334> to Yahweh<WH3068> before<WH6440> Eli.<WH5941> The word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> was precious<WH3368> in those days;<WH3117> there was no frequent<WH6555> vision.<WH2377>

and the lamp<WH5216> of God<WH430> hadn't<WH3518> yet gone out, and Samuel<WH8050> had laid down<WH7901> in the temple<WH1964> of Yahweh,<WH3068> where the ark<WH727> of God was;<WH430>

Yahweh<WH3068> called<WH7121> yet again,<WH3254> "Samuel!<WH8050>" Samuel<WH8050> arose<WH6965> and went<WH3212> to Eli,<WH5941> and said,<WH559> "Here I am;<WH7121> for you called me.<WH559>" He answered, "I didn't<WH7121> call, my son;<WH1121> lie down<WH7901> again.<WH7725>"

Yahweh<WH3068> called<WH7121> Samuel<WH8050> again<WH3254> the third time.<WH7992> He arose<WH6965> and went<WH3212> to Eli,<WH5941> and said,<WH559> "Here I am;<WH7121> for you called me.<WH5941>" Eli perceived<WH995> that Yahweh<WH3068> had called<WH7121> the child.<WH5288>

Therefore Eli<WH5941> said<WH559> to Samuel,<WH8050> "Go,<WH3212> lie down:<WH7901> and it shall be,<WH7121> if he calls you,<WH559> that you shall say, <WH1696> 'Speak, Yahweh;<WH3068> for your servant<WH5650> hears.<WH8085>'" So Samuel<WH8050> went<WH3212> and lay down<WH7901> in his place.<WH4725>

Yahweh<WH3068> came,<WH935> and stood,<WH3320> and called<WH7121> as at other times,<WH6471> "Samuel!<WH8050> Samuel!<WH8050>" Then Samuel<WH8050> said,<WH559> "Speak;<WH1696> for your servant<WH5650> hears.<WH8085>"

Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Samuel,<WH8050> "Behold,<WH6213> I will do a thing<WH1697> in Israel,<WH3478> at which both<WH8147> the ears<WH241> of everyone who hears<WH8085> it shall tingle.<WH6750>
In that day<WH3117> I will perform<WH6965> against Eli<WH5941> all that I have spoken<WH1696> concerning<WH413> his house,<WH1004> from the beginning<WH2490> even to the end.<WH3615>

For I have told<WH5046> him that I will judge<WH8199> his house<WH1004> forever,<WH5769> for<WH5704> the iniquity<WH5771> which he knew,<WH3045> because his sons<WH1121> brought a curse<WH7043> on themselves,<WH3543> and he didn't restrain them.

Therefore I have sworn<WH7650> to the house<WH1004> of Eli,<WH5941> that the iniquity<WH5771> of Eli<WH5941>'s house<WH1004> shall not be removed<WH3722> with sacrifice<WH2077> nor offering<WH2077><WH99999> forever.<WH5769>"

Samuel<WH8050> lay<WH7901> until the morning,<WH1242> and opened<WH6605> the doors<WH1817> of the house<WH1004> of Yahweh.<WH3068> Samuel<WH8050> feared<WH3372> to show<WH5046> Eli<WH5941> the vision.<WH4759>
Then Eli<WH5941> called<WH7121> Samuel,<WH8050> and said,<WH559> "Samuel,<WH8050> my son!<WH1121>" He said,<WH559> "Here I am."

He said,<WH559> "What is the thing<WH1697> that he has spoken<WH1696> to you?<WH3582> Please don't hide it from me.<WH430> God do so<WH6213> to you,<WH3254> and more also, if you hide<WH3582> anything<WH1697> from me of all the things<WH1697> that he spoke to you.<WH1696>"
Samuel<WH8050> told<WH5046> him every bit,<WH1697> and hid<WH3582> nothing from him.<WH559> He said, "It is Yahweh.<WH3068> Let him do<WH6213> what seems<WH5869> good to him.<WH2896>"
Samuel<WH8050> grew,<WH1431> and Yahweh<WH3068> was with him,<WH1697> and let none of his words fall<WH5307> to the ground.<WH776>
All Israel<WH3478> from Dan<WH1835> even to Beersheba<WH884> knew<WH3045> that Samuel<WH8050> was established<WH539> to be a prophet<WH5030> of Yahweh.<WH3068>
Yahweh<WH3068> appeared<WH7200> again<WH3254> in Shiloh;<WH7887> for Yahweh<WH3068> revealed<WH1540> himself to Samuel<WH8050> in Shiloh<WH7887> by the word<WH1697> of Yahweh.<WH3068>
